description: Pimm’s Cup is a&nbsp;summertime staple that never goes out of style. With its refreshing taste and easygoing feel, this drink will leave you feeling refreshed in more ways than one!The Pimm’s cup comes versatile, so no matter your mood or preference, you can find something perfect for any occasion here.
name: Pimm’s Cup

recipeInstructions.name: Fill a tall glass with crushed ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill a tall glass with crushed ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour in Pimm’s liqueur and add an orange slice for garnish.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour in Pimm’s liqueur and add an orange slice for garnish.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the ginger beer on top.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the ginger beer on top.

recipeInstructions.name: Finish the drink with slices of cucumber and other fruits.
recipeInstructions.text: Finish the drink with slices of cucumber and other fruits.
